page.title: 05New Roads
page.content: At present the A2 Trunk Road which links Dover with London is being reconstructed between Falconwood and Eltham to make it up to a motorway standard.It will open in 1987 and the whole area will have a new traffic system to prevent through journeys along side roads. A lot of people are campaigning against a new link road from the A2 across Oxleas Wood,Woodlands Farm, Welling and Plumstead,then across the Thames on a new bridge.They say it would ruin the woods where there are many species of plants unique to the area,e.g.the London service tree.Many houses will have to be knocked down too.
